Package imagingbook.lib.ij

Class LookupTables

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.ij.LookupTables
  • public abstract class LookupTables
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds utility methods for lookup-tables and implementations of various standard ImageJ lookup tables (originally defined in class LutLoader.
    Version:
    2016/12/19

      Constructors

      LookupTables()

      • create

        public static ij.process.LUT create​(byte[] r,
                                    byte[] g,
                                    byte[] b)
        Create a new lookup-table from three RGB arrays of length 256.
        Parameters:
        r - Red component values.
        g - Green component values.
        b - Blue component values.
        Returns:
        A new instance of type LUT.

      • listCurrentLut

        public static void listCurrentLut​(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip)
        Lists the contents of the lookup-table currently associated with the specified image.
        Parameters:
        ip - The image.

      • brightLut

        public static void brightLut​(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip,
                             int minGray)
        Modifies the lookup table to display a bright image with gray values in the range minGray ... 255. Does nothing if ip is of type ColorProcessor.
        Parameters:
        ip - The target image.
        minGray - Minimum gray value.
